_xResult.title: Thief in the Night Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made velvet dress with bell sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
This made to measure black dress is the perfect choice for days at the office, leisurely days or casual parties. Based on your event, you can match it with a stiletto or sweet ballerinas and you will be ready for whatever the day or night has ahead. The bell-type sleeves feature three buttons for ease of getting in or out. Don't be shyâ€”choose your favorite of the 7 colors available.


You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
